title: Horizonte Minerals receives part of funds from placement

Fri, Oct 2, 2015, 12:18 BST - UK Markets close in 4 hrs 12 mins Horizonte Minerals receives part of funds from placement By Daniel Cancian | Sharecast – 26 minutes ago 1.282 +0.051 
LONDON (ShareCast) - (ShareCast News) - Nickel mining development group Horizonte Minerals (LSE: HZM.L - news ) said on Friday it has received part of the funding from its recent placing. The Brazil-focused company has received £1.1m from issuing 112.5m shares at 1p each, with 42.5m still to be issued at the same price on the Toronto Stock Exchange. 
The group has completed the placing to fund part of the payment due for the acquisition of the Brazil-based Araguaia nickel project from mining giant Glencore (Xetra: A1JAGV - news ) .
